channel.title: Requiring a combat level on a teleport
channel.description:
well i want to make certain teleports require a combat level to use...
i took an already written teleport and changed it into this [code]if(c.teleEffect == 1 && combatLevel >= 3 && combatLevel <= 59) c.triggerTele(3088, 3518, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers();[/code] and when i compile i get this error
[img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/7665/errorka.png[/img]
for some reason its not understanding combatLevel but i copied combatLevel exactly from another section of code in my source

item.title: Requiring a combat level on a teleport
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

Haha it’s okay no problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Requiring a combat level on a teleport
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

H¡tler:

add c. infront of combat level ;).

oh wow, thanks alot, i feel stupid now lol

i just got back to programming today after having stopped for months…

But thanks again, guess i wasnt thinking,

and i tried to rep++ you but apparantly i cant anymore >.>

Read full topic
